data.title: Oregon Power Outages and PGE Outage Map
data.meta_description: View current PGE outage locations, and estimated repair and restoration times of each PGE outage. Interact with our power outages map.
data.text:
Browser Settings

To sign in to your PGE web account, your browser must be set to accept cookies and JavaScript must be enabled.

A cookie is a small text file stored on your computer by a website to give you a unique numeric ID. PGE doesn’t use cookies to track personal information; they are used to enhance your web experience by:

Protecting your privacy and security: We’ll sign you out automatically after 20 idle minutes.

Activating the "Remember Me" feature so your email address is provided automatically the next time you sign in.

PGE also works with third parties that use cookies on our site to conduct visitor surveys and to enable other features.
